svg.content: <mxfile><diagram id="business-service-architecture" name="業務サービス層システム関連図"></diagram></mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(230, 230, 230), rgb(39, 39, 39)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 42px; margin-left: 21px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
